about_the_game:
Try your luck in luxury with the Luxury Hotel and Casino tileset for RPG Maker! Put your bets on this shimmering gold setůit even includes a fancy hotel suite.

The Luxury Hotel and Casino Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Water and pool (gold edge)
gold marble floor
neutral solid floor
3 super-detailed rugs
gold tile
repeating circular floor pattern
gold fence
2 styles of adjustable table

Wall Tiles:

gold marble
fancy brown wall
fancy gold wall
plain gold wall
plain brown wall
vertical gold edge trimmed wall
bookshelf wall
windows with 4 colors of sky (also includes moon and stars to add more detail)

Also includes:

NEW! More seating options!
roulette tables
2 styles of slot machines at different angles
blackjack tables
poker table
craps table
poker chips and cards
ATMs
computers and office supplies to make a cash-out area
golden signs in various sizes (with blanks you can customize or localize)
fancy architecture with pillars, stairs, golden windows and trim
plus more!
elegant cabinets and bar equipment
various food and beverage tiles
suite furniture with bed, curtains, bathtub, etc
and more!

Events and Animations:

Animated doors and even a fountain!

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated game
